content: > this pattern is available for free on my blog 1 the downloadable pdf listed for sale contains the full pattern including all sizes charts and tutorials in one printable file without advertisements the knot knit cowl is not only stylish practical and reversible but it s also a great mostly mindless project that you can crochet when you re needing to decompress after a long stressful day at work or at home you can also make it using any weight yarn you choose this paid pdf includes all photo tutorials and is an ad-free version yarn the yarn in the sample is plymouth encore chunky bulky weight however the pattern is written so that you can use any weight yarn you d like cowl is an a crocheted simplicity original design join the a crocheted simplicity crochet community group on facebook to stay up to date with new releases giveaways sales and testing opportunities https //www facebook com/groups/906744872727855/ you can also find me on etsy a crocheted simplicity & craftsy jennifer pionk all of my patterns are written in standard american terms unless noted otherwise please note that due to the nature of digital files i cannot take any refunds however i do offer customer support and will try my best to help you with the instructions © 2017 designed by jennifer pionk aka a crocheted simplicity all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are property of a crocheted simplicity the buyer may use this pattern for personal use and charity sales of finished items are also permitted credit given to a crocheted simplicity is greatly appreciated no part of this document may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from jennifer pionk 1 http //www acrochetedsimplicity com/free-crochet-pattern-knot-knit-cowl/
